argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | invfval.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | invfval.n | |- N = ( Inv ` C ) |
| 3 |  | invfval.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | invfval.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | invfval.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Sect ` C ) = ( Sect ` C ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_isinv | |- ( ph -> ( F ( X N Y ) G <-> ( F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) G /\ G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ancom | |- ( ( F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) G /\ G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) <-> ( G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F /\ F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) G ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ph -> ( F ( X N Y ) G <-> ( G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F /\ F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) G ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 5, 4, 6 | #P_isinv | |- ( ph -> ( G ( Y N X ) F <-> ( G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F /\ F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) G ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_bitr4d | |- ( ph -> ( F ( X N Y ) G <-> G ( Y N X ) F ) ) |
